page.title: 11CHURCHES IN BRIDGE END
page.content: THERE ARE THREE CHURCHES IN BRIDGE END, THE METHODIST, THE BAPTIST AND THE CHURCH OF SCOTLAND. THERE IS USUALLY A SERVICE IN THE METHODIST CHURCH ONCE A WEEK,AND THE CHURCH OF SCOTLAND EVERY SECOND WEEK. THERE IS NO SUNDAY SCHOOL IN THE METHODIST CHURCH, AND THE SUNDAY SCHOOL FROM THE BAPTIST CHURCH MEETS AT HAMNAVOE, AS DOES THE SUNDAY SCHOOL AT THE CHURCH OF SCOTLAND. THE BAPTIST MINISTER PREACHES TWICE ON SUNDAY.THE MANSE IS JOINED ON TO THE BAPTIST CHURCH SO HE DOESN'T HAVE FAR TO GO. THERE ARE WOMENS' GROUPS IN EACH CHURCH BUT NO MENS' GROUPS. IN THE METHODIST CHURCH BUILDING THERE IS A DOCTOR'S SURGERY ONCE A WEEK. THE CHURCH OF SCOTLAND MANSE IS RENTED OUT AS THE MINISTER FOR BURRA ALSO COVERS OTHER AREAS.
